page.title: 07Village Fete
page.content: On 15th June 1985 an event,took place on the Village Green which is called a{Fete.}It was in aid of the{Village {Hall.}A fete consists of stalls, games, dancing and entertainments. The fete started at 1.30pm when the procession started,led by the Boys Brigade,followed by the Scouts, Cubs, Beavers, Brownies and Guides. Then after the Guides came the two floats.The first float carried the {Rose Queen}and her attendants.The second float carried the contestants who didn't qualify. After the parade the Rose Queen had to be crowned and a prize was given to every contestant. I was crowned as the Rose Queen. Then at 2.00 John Twells declared the fete opened. There were dancers on the Village Green and the John Port Band were playing. You could go to the Village Hall for something to eat or
